nodes.text:
The binder is tabbed, cross-referenced, and slightly swollen from humidity.
The cover sheet says: SPINDLE SITE — OPERATOR SHUTDOWN SEQUENCE (OFFICIAL).
A sticky note at the top reads: “REVISION CHECKED (I THINK).”

It is a shutdown. (pause)
The official one has a signature block. (pause)
It ties your hands. (pause)
It protects you later. (pause)
This one—page seven is wrong. (pause)
Or missing. (pause)
Or replaced with a version meant right. (pause)

Page seven is the control room access authorization. (pause)
Not physical access—everyone can enter, unfortunately. (pause)
Operational access. (pause)
Logging system access. (pause)
The part where you become the person. (pause)
The part where you did it.

choices.text: Ask: Can I proceed without it?

nodes.text: You can proceed. (pause) The site will let you. (pause) The equipment doesn't care about forms. (pause) The audit trail will care. Long memory.
